Export.zv: Cache for UNIX (Red Hat Enterprise Linux for x86-64) 2014.1.3 (Build 775)

Method.name: OnPageBODY
Method.Implementation:
Write "" Write !,"" Do ..WriteTitlePane("@Ensemble:HL7ManagerRawMessageStructure@Ensemble HL7 Raw Message Structure") Write !,"
" Write !,!,"
" Write "HL7 Raw Message Structure definition is displayed below:" Write "
" Write !,"
",! Write ! set ms=%request.Get("MS") set category=$p(ms,":",2) set secondary=$p(ms,":",3) If ((category'="")&&(secondary'="")) { set description=..EscapeHTML(##class(EnsLib.HL7.Schema).GetDescription(ms)) if $data(^EnsHL7.Schema(category,"MS",secondary))=0 { write ""_ms_" Definition does not exist!",! quit } } Write !,!,""_(category_":"_secondary)_" "_($G(description))_"",! Write "

",! Write ! If ((category'="")&&(secondary'="")) { Set struct=^EnsHL7.Schema(category,"MS",secondary) write "Raw Definition:" write "",! write "" write "
"_struct_"
" write "
" } Write !,!,"

",! Write "" Write "(Show All Categories)" Write "" Write "
",! Write "" Write "(Show All Message Structures in category '"_(category)_"')" Write "" Write "
",! Write "" Write "(Show Definition diagram)" Write "" Write !,!,""

Method.name: OnPageHEAD
Method.Implementation: Write "<head>" Write !,"<title>Ensemble HL7 Raw Message Structure</title>",! Write "<link rel=""stylesheet"" type=""text/css"" href=""/csp/sys/csputils.css"" title=""Standard Style""/>" Write !,"</head>"

Method.name: OnPageHTML
Method.Implementation: Write "<html>" Write ! Do ..OnPageHEAD() Write ! Do ..OnPageBODY() Write !,"</html>"
